channel.title: 2 Questions about Caches

item.title: 2 Questions about Caches
item.dc:creator: @Decysp Decysp
item.description:
@Decysp wrote:

JavaTC:

Change it to ./cache

Meaning… C:/Desktop/Endura V2/Client/./cache?..

I want it to auto-download to the Client and work with it in the client… So like… the cache doesn’t have to be in the C: drive to work, i want it on my Desktop, in my Client folder… >_<

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions about Caches
item.dc:creator: @Decysp Decysp
item.description:
@Decysp wrote:

  1. Bump…

  2. More important question, I went into signlink.java and changed:

public static final String findcachedir() { String s; String s1; File file; s = "C:/.enduracache"; s1 = ""; file = new File((new StringBuilder()).append(s1).append(s).toString()); if(file.exists() || file.mkdir()) { return (new StringBuilder()).append(s1).append(s).append("/").toString(); } return null; }

I Changed the C:/.enduracache to C:/Desktop/Endura V2/Client/.enduracache

Now it gives me the error “Cannot connect to server, retrying in 5-10-15-20-etc”

Help?

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions about Caches
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Change the directory to ./cache

or just cache/

Read full topic
